abstract: The Rio Tinto Group, the mining company, said Tuesday that it had asked British regulators to force its competitor BHP Billiton to turn its $139 billion takeover proposal into a formal bid or to drop the offer.
lead_paragraph: The Rio Tinto Group, the mining company, said Tuesday that it had asked British regulators to force its competitor BHP Billiton to turn its $139 billion takeover proposal into a formal bid or to drop the offer.

headline.main: Rio Tells BHP to Put Up or Shut Up
